dc_title_s: Zoning Downtown Designated Streets Buffer: Washington, D.C.
dc_description_s: A 5 meter buffered boundary created from the <a href="http://dcgis.maps.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=f22a3a244b624fd1a8121919d3d186b0" target="_blank">Zoning Downtown Designated Streets lines. The data was designed to intersect with the neighboring lots along each segment of the designated streets.The review of the Zoning Regulations of 1958 The new Zoning Regulations of 2016 were published on March 4The purposes of the Downtown (D) zones (D-1-RDetailed information at <a href="http://dcoz.dc.gov" target="_blank">http://dcoz.dc.gov.Created as part of the Zoning Regulations of 2016.
